active_incidents.title: Searches are failing for some users

notes.body:
We are continuing to work towards a fix for this issue. As a workaround, users have been able to successfully search by excluding bots from their search results. Here’s how to do it:

1. Search for a message in Slack
2. Click on the “More filters” option
3. Check the box that reads “Exclude apps, bots, and workflows”

Thank you for your continued patience.

Thank you for your continued patience while we work on a fix. As a potential workaround, some users have been able to search successfully by excluding bots from their search results. We’ll continue to provide updates as we make progress on this.
Some users are experiencing issues when searching for messages in Slack. We’re on the case and will provide another update once we have more details to share. We’re sorry for the disruption here.
